import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../assest/Bd.css'; import Skeletond from '../skeleton/Skeletond'; const BlogDetail = () => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const { id } = useParams(); const [ blog, setBlogs ] = useState([]); const [ isPending, setIsPending ] = useState(true); useEffect( () => { setTimeout(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:8000/blog/api/' + id); console.log(response); setBlogs(response.data); setIsPending(false); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; fetchData(); }, 5000); }, [ id ] ); const createBlog = () => { return { __html: blog.content }; }; return (
{isPending && (
